alert.note: Alert for Early; Miller; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 4:58PM EDT until June 18 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MILLER...SOUTH CENTRAL EARLY AND NORTHEASTERN SEMINOLE COUNTIES... At 458 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Donalsonville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Donalsonville, Iron City, Jakin, Saffold, Killarney, Sharphagen, Donaldsonville A/P, Howards Mill, Davis Park, Enterprise and Lela. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
